title: The Adc meta atm
body: I really like that the bot lane meta. Finally it's not just Support and Adc that can go bot lane. Similar changes has been happening to all other lanes and it's finally happening to bot lane ^^

replies.body:
The problem with that mindset, is that if you push marksmen out of botlane, they no longer have a place in the game. Botlane is the only place they really succeed.

"But they can go top and completely destroy top laners." Until people realize most marksmen are free kills for an aggressive jungler to gank. Then they're unable to farm. So, there is that. :3 "Diversity" in a lane at the cost of an entire class is not healthy for the game as a whole. (already traditional supports are being pushed out because of mages that are either too weak for mid-lane currently, or are too good all around)
adcs going mid has always been a thing, jhin/cait can farm safely and ez, vayne, luc and tris can be pretty hard to gank if they know how to ward correctly
